files.content:
import Link from "next/link"

import {
  Breadcrumb,
  BreadcrumbEllipsis,
  BreadcrumbItem,
  BreadcrumbLink,
  BreadcrumbList,
  BreadcrumbPage,
  BreadcrumbSeparator,
} from "@/registry/default/ui/breadcrumb"
import { Button } from "@/registry/default/ui/button"
import {
  Menu,
  MenuItem,
  MenuPopup,
  MenuTrigger,
} from "@/registry/default/ui/menu"

export default function BreadcrumbDemo() {
  return (
    <Breadcrumb>
      <BreadcrumbList>
        <BreadcrumbItem>
          <BreadcrumbLink render={<Link href="/" />}>
            Updated Home
          </BreadcrumbLink>
        </BreadcrumbItem>
        <BreadcrumbSeparator />
        <BreadcrumbItem>
          <Menu>
            <MenuTrigger
              render={
                <Button size="icon-sm" variant="ghost" className="-m-1.5" />
              }
            >
              <BreadcrumbEllipsis />
            </MenuTrigger>
            <MenuPopup align="start">
              <MenuItem render={<Link href="/docs" />}>Updated Docs</MenuItem>
              <MenuItem render={<Link href="/particles" />}>
                Updated Particles
              </MenuItem>
            </MenuPopup>
          </Menu>
        </BreadcrumbItem>
        <BreadcrumbSeparator />
        <BreadcrumbItem>
          <BreadcrumbLink render={<Link href="/docs/components" />}>
            Updated Components
          </BreadcrumbLink>
        </BreadcrumbItem>
        <BreadcrumbSeparator />
        <BreadcrumbItem>
          <BreadcrumbPage>Updated Breadcrumb</BreadcrumbPage>
        </BreadcrumbItem>
      </BreadcrumbList>
    </Breadcrumb>
  )
}
